info.name: CHIYU IoT XSS
author: geeknik
info.description: Several versions and models of CHIYU IoT devices are vulnerable to multiple Cross-Site Scripting flaws.

User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)

Authorization: Basic OmFkbWlu
Accept-Encoding: gzip
